title: PIMALUOS: Physics Informed Multi-Agent Land Use Optimization Software
description: An open-source Python package for urban land-use optimization combining Graph Neural Networks, Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning, physics-based simulation, and LLM-RAG for zoning constraint extraction. Features an interactive Next.js dashboard for scenario exploration.
notes: This software accompanies the paper 'Physics Informed Multi-Agent Land Use Optimization' submitted to Computers, Environment and Urban Systems.
